Question: dentalverse CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dentalverse

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Introducing the latest AI-powered dental imaging technology
- Enhanced diagnostic capabilities for more accurate treatment planning
- Streamlined workflow integration with existing practice management software
- Improved patient experience with reduced radiation exposure and faster scanning times
Summary_cn:
牙科宇宙

CES 2024 产品亮点

- 推出最新的人工智能驱动的牙科影像技术
- 增强诊断能力，以便更准确的治疗计划
- 与现有的诊所管理软件实现无缝工作流集成
- 减少辐射暴露和提高扫描速度，从而改善患者体验
